item.title: OKX C2C has launched a new "Freeze Compensation" system: up to 100% compensation with a limit of 30,000 USDT.
item.description: According to an official proclamation, on August 27th, 2025, OKX officially initiated a novel "Frozen Compensation" system. Users engaging in transactions with merchants marked with "Frozen Compensation" will be qualified for a compensation ratio of up to 100% and a maximum single claim limit of 30,000 USDT in the event that their receiving account is frozen due to the counterparty's payment. At the same time, they will also receive support from the platform's funds, enhancing security and protection.It is reported that only high-quality merchants that have passed strict audits can obtain the "Frozen Compensation" qualification. These include Bulk Compensation Merchants and Certified Compensation Merchants. Among them, Bulk Compensation Merchants have paid a substantial security deposit, ensuring safety, reliability, and strong compensation capabilities. Certified Compensation Merchants are certified by the platform and provide stable compensation in accordance with the rules. Users

item.title: The US-based cloud development platform company Vercel's AI-powered frontend development tool v0 now accepts USDC for purchasing credits.
item.description: On August 27th, according to official information, the AI frontend development tool v0 of the U.S.-based cloud development platform company Vercel has announced that users are now able to purchase v0 points by using USDC.

item.title: Tom Lee Updates Ethereum Price Target Prediction: Surge to $5,500 in a Few Weeks, Year-End Target of $10,000 to $12,000
item.description: On August 27th, Tom Lee, the chairman of BitMine, recently stated in a live interview with amit that he anticipates Ethereum to rise to $5500 within a few weeks, with a year-end target price ranging from $10,000 to $12,000. Generally, in the cryptocurrency market, significant movements often occur in the fourth quarter. "So, if you have already achieved a 35% gain since the beginning of the year and need to end up with a 200% gain for the year, most of that gain is likely to happen in the next few months."However, Tom Lee also expressed worries about a potential seasonal market correction in September. Nevertheless, he still emphasized that "a dip presents a buying opportunity."

item.title: HYPE records a 24-hour price increase of 11.77%, continuing to hit an all-time high
item.description: On August 27th, based on market data, HYPE reached a peak of $49.798. Currently, it is trading at $49.37, showing a 24-hour percentage increase of 11.84% and setting a new all-time high.

item.title: A certain user insider traded on the news of Taylor Swift's engagement, accurately purchasing relevant prediction shares on Polymarket
item.description: On August 27th, according to the crypto KOL @Domahhhh, a Polymarket user named "romanticpaul" has been vigorously betting on the prediction of Taylor Swift's engagement since approximately 3:00 PM local time the previous day.The user raised the probability of the event "Taylor Swift will get engaged to Travis Kelce this year" from 25% to 45%. Nevertheless, the total amount of funds involved in this prediction is not considerable (approximately $350,000).In today's news, the renowned singer Taylor Swift officially announced her engagement to the NFL star Travis Kelce on social media.

item.title: The Federal Reserve Responds for the First Time to "Trump Fires Powell": Implies Court Appearance
item.description: On August 27th, a spokesperson for the Federal Reserve stated that, in accordance with the Federal Reserve Act, Congress clearly mandated that Federal Reserve Board members should have long and fixed terms and could only be removed by the President for "good cause." The long-term tenure of Board members and the dismissal protection mechanism are crucial safeguards to ensure that monetary policy decisions are based on data, economic analysis, and the long-term interests of the American people.The Federal Reserve will continue to fulfill its duties in accordance with the law. Board member Cook has stated through her personal attorney that she will immediately challenge this action in court. As always, the Federal Reserve will abide by any court rulings. (Xinhua News)

item.title: CoinList has launched the private sale portal CoinList Alpha, with the first transaction supporting Solana-based fintech firm Sharp's PIPE private financing.
item.description: On August 27th, CoinList made an announcement regarding the launch of the private sale portal, CoinList Alpha. The purpose of this launch is to provide eligible investors with access to curated private sale opportunities that range from seed rounds to strategic corporate private placements.It is reported that the first transaction launched on the website is CoinList's offering for eligible investors to participate in Solana's strategic finance company, Sharps Technology (STSS), in its PIPE private funding opportunity.

item.title: Statistics: Suspected Four Major Addresses Colluded to Snipe XPL Hedge Positions, Profiting $46.1 Million
item.description: On August 27th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai9684xtpa), four major addresses participated in a sniper attack aimed at the $XPL hedge short position, amassing a total profit of up to $46.1 million. The leading address 0xb9c...6801e has been continuously accumulating long positions since August 24th and made a large purchase in the early morning at 05:35 today, directly sweeping the entire order book and earning a profit of $16 million in just one minute. The other three cooperating addresses started to close their positions for profit when the XPL price reached a short-term high.Analysis reveals that two of the addresses have the same source of funds, and all three major addresses obtained their margin through debridge cross-chain, exhibiting similar operational habits and demonstrating the characteristics of coordinated operation.

item.title: Approaching the WLFI launch, a whale spent approximately $1.12 million to buy Block, a WLFI-related meme coin
item.description: On August 27th, as monitored by LookOnChain, with the WLFI listing time approaching in 5 days, a whale has established a new wallet '0x8C43' and spent 248 ETH (equivalent to 1.12 million USD) 6 hours ago to purchase 6.95 million units of the WLFI-related meme coin Block.

item.title: Ethereum Foundation Teams Up with Columbia University to Launch Blockchain-themed Podcast, First Episode to Air Today
item.description: On August 27th, as per official information, the Office of Academic Affairs of the Ethereum Foundation has entered into a partnership with Columbia University to launch a blockchain-themed podcast named "From Whiteboard to Mainnet." The first episode, which centers around "Optimal Dynamic Fees for Blockchain Resources," is set to premiere today.
